name: WeCook
overview:
WeCook.fr is making personalized meals recommendations. Tell us what you like, what are your cooking skills, your budget and we provide you with healthy and personalized meals recommendations for one week with your family or for an event with your friends. From the meals we offer you the matching shopping list and will enable you to order it directly online.

WeCook.fr is both a recommendation and an organization tool. From the tastes, cooking skills and the budget of the user, WeCook.fr proposes balanced meals for him and his family or for an event with his friends. To do it, we are using all the content already available on the web. We have developed a unique technology able to go on any webpage, to identify if a recipe is there and to extract from it the ingredients, the nutritional facts and event the tastes. More than the meals, we offer the user the matching shopping list that he will be able to order it directly online or to print with product coupons and recommendations.
